params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"CUST_CD\\" as \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_NAME\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_NAME\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_KNAME\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_KNAME\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_ENAME\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_ENAME\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"ZIP_CD\\" as \\"ZIP_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"ADDRESS_1\\" as \\"ADDRESS_1\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"ADDRESS_2\\" as \\"ADDRESS_2\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"ADDRESS_K_1\\" as \\"ADDRESS_K_1\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"ADDRESS_K_2\\" as \\"ADDRESS_K_2\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"TEL\\" as \\"TEL\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"FAX\\" as \\"FAX\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"TRANSPORT_CD\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"TRANSPORT_LT\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_LT\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DEPO_WH_CD\\" as \\"DEPO_WH_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"SHIP_WH_CD\\" as \\"SHIP_WH_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_NAME\\" as \\"CUST_NAME\\", " +" M_WH1.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"DEPO_WH_NAME\\", " +" M_WH2.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"SHIP_WH_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_WH M_WH1, " +" M_WH M_WH2 " +"where " +" M_CUST_BASE.COMPANY_CD = M_CUST.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and M_CUST_BASE.CUST_CD = M_CUST.CUST_CD(+) " +" and M_CUST_BASE.DEPO_WH_CD = M_WH1.WH_CD(+) " +" and M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD = M_WH2.WH_CD(+) " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_WH.\\"WH_TYP\\" = '20'"

"select " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" as \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" as \\"DEPO_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_NAME\\" as \\"CUST_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_CUST " +"where " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_WH.\\"WH_TYP\\" = '10'"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_WH.\\"WH_TYP\\" = '20'"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_WH.\\"WH_TYP\\" = '10'"

"SELECT " +" T_ODR.ODR_NO " +"FROM " +" T_ODR, " +" T_ODR_ACPT_RSLT, " +" T_SHIP_ODR " +"WHERE " +" T_ODR.DLV_LOC_CD = ? " +" AND T_ODR.DEPO_TYP = '20' " +" AND T_ODR.ODR_NO = T_ODR_ACPT_RSLT.ODR_NO " +" AND T_ODR_ACPT_RSLT.CUST_CD = ? " +" AND T_ODR.DEL_FLG = '0' " +" AND T_SHIP_ODR.ODR_NO = T_ODR.ODR_NO " +" AND T_SHIP_ODR.DEPO_TRANSFER_PROC_FLG = '0'"
